arts.ttl: ‘Crazy game!’ - Flick wowed by Barca’s comeback
arts.sum: The visitors looked set for defeat at the Estadio da Luz but managed to turn the game around and win it thanks to a late strike from Raphinha. “I don’t think I’ve ever experienced a comeback like this.

arts.ttl: Benfica 4-5 Barcelona: Multiple records set in astonishing evening at the Estadio da Luz
arts.sum: Multiple Champions League records have been set in Barcelona's astonishing 5-4 win over Benfica this evening.

arts.ttl: Slot praises referee after Barcelona's fightback against Benfica despite it costing Liverpool
arts.sum: Barcelona’s spectacular fightback against Benfica on Tuesday meant Liverpool would have to wait another week to be confirmed winner of the league phase of the new look Champions League. But manager Arne Slot was full of praise for referee Danny Makkelie playing so much stoppage time in the 5-4 win for Barcelona.

arts.ttl: Raphinha caps late Barcelona comeback to settle nine-goal thriller with Benfica
arts.sum: Raphinha scored deep into stoppage time to hand Barcelona a dramatic 5-4 comeback win at Benfica and a place in the last 16 of the Champions League on Tuesday. Vangelis Pavlidis’s hat-trick had given the hosts a two-goal half-time lead and they were 4-2 up with 12 minutes to play before Hansi Flick’s side pulled out a sensational victory, sealed by the Brazilian with a finish on the break, seconds after Benfica had appealed in vain for a late penalty. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Barcelona qualifies for the round of 16 in the Champions League by beating Benfica 4-5 in a crazy game
arts.sum: Liverpool became the first team to guarantee a place in the last 16 of the new Champions League format by beating Lille 2-1 on Tuesday, while Barcelona fought back from two goals down to stun Benfica 5-4 in a thriller. Harvey Elliott's bouncing, deflected shot gave Liverpool its seventh win from seven games, just after 10-man Lille had equalized following Mohamed Salah's opening goal.

arts.ttl: Benfica 4-5 Barcelona: Match report & talking points as Catalans stage incredible comeback

arts.sum: A photo of the immediate reaction of Barcelona head coach Hansi Flick to his side’s last-gasp victory over Benfica has come to the fore online. Barcelona, of course, are fresh…

arts.ttl: Benfica 4-5 Barcelona: Raphinha seals comeback in dramatic Champions League classic
arts.sum: Hansi Flick’s side secure place in last 16 and could yet steal top spot from Liverpool

arts.ttl: Benfica 4-5 Barcelona: Highlights, man of the match, stats as visitors create history with stunning comeback
arts.sum: Barcelona stage a stunning fightback to pull off a memorable 5-4 Champions League victory over Benfica at Estadio da Luz.

arts.ttl: Benfica 4-5 Barcelona: Player Ratings From the Craziest Game of the Champions League Season
arts.sum: Barcelona came from behind to defeat Benfica in a thrilling game to secure their place in the Champions League round of 16.
